title: Trapped with the Lawyer - Novel Updates
author: Bai Cha   白茶
description:
An independent sequel to the story Trapped with the CEO

He was a world-famous lawyer.

She was an international superstar.

Their paths crossed on the wedding of Harry Si and Lola Li.

But his families didn’t welcome her, and his distrust nearly killed their baby.

Their otherwise happy life was now in peril.

Did he love her?

Did he get to the truth?

Did they overcome all the difficulties?

See for yourself!>
